To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements At least 1 to 3 year(s) of working experience in the related field. Additional Requirements Excellent knowledge of MS Office (especially Excel and Word) Proven data entry work experience. Good command over English and Bengali writing and speaking. Good organizational and multi-tasking abilities. Must be able to work for longer hours when needed. Responsibilities & Context We are looking for a dynamic, hard working and enthusiastic employee for the mentioned position. Job Responsibilities Receiving visitors/customers at the front desk by greeting and welcoming them courteously & appropriately and visitor & customer record maintain. Receiving and answering the calls quickly and efficiently in a professional manner & forwarding incoming phone calls. Provide prompt and courteous service: both on the phone and in person. Demonstrate friendliness and proper phone etiquette with every customer. Dispatch all kinds of letters and receive & distribute as well. Sort and distribute incoming mails, emails and handle outgoing mails & emails. Keeping the front desk tidy and presentable with all necessary material. Maintain meeting room & event inside office premise. Overall management of the Front Desk Office. Able to perform data entry and basic IT support. Coordination between companies to perform administrative tasks. Other duties as and when required by the management. Skills & Expertise Suggested by Customer Relationship Management Customer Support through PhoneEmail Receptionist/ Front Desk Employment Status Full Time Gender Only females are allowed to apply. Responsibilities & Context CS Lab Limited is a renowned ISO/IEC 17025:2017 accredited calibration laboratory dedicated to setting the global benchmark for accuracy and technical competence. We provide world-class metrology solutions to high-stakes sectors, including pharmaceuticals, healthcare, food & beverage, and advanced manufacturing. Key Responsibilities As a vital member of our technical team, you will ensure the traceability and reliability of our clients' most critical measurement assets. Perform Calibration Job: Perform precision calibrations on a wide variety of instruments and equipment in laboratory, manufacturing, and technical environments. Documentation: Prepare comprehensive Calibration Certificates and technical reports for all project activities, ensuring audit-ready accuracy. Measurement Troubleshooting: Diagnose and resolve complex technical deviations. You will be responsible for identifying the root causes of equipment drift or out-of-tolerance (OOT) conditions. Strategic Collaboration: Act as a technical consultant for our clients, translating their operational needs into precise calibration protocols and tailored engineering solutions. NESL Lab Analyst : National Energy Services Limited Jobs ENG ‡¶¨‡¶æ‡¶Ç‡¶≤‡¶æ Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List National Energy Services Limited NESL Lab Analyst Application Deadline : 20 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: 1 Location: Sylhet Salary: Negotiable Published: 29 Jan 2026 To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Prior analytical experience is oil and gas laboratory is preferable but not mandatory. Basic analytical knowledge and proficiency in MS Office applications, Strong communication skill both in English and Bangla. Responsibilities & Context National Energy Services Limited (NESL) is a company incorporated in Bangladesh rendering comprehensive human resource solutions to energy, construction, Telecommunication and manufacturing industries of Bangladesh. We recruit across various verticals for multinational corporations as well as leading business houses of the country. NESL now invites applications from competent candidates for the post of NESL Lab Analyst for one of it‚Äôs Clients in Oil & Gas sector. Overview: The position will be responsible for perform day to day technical laboratory analysis of a natural gas plant. The position requires working on non-routine tasks (sampling and analysis) requested by operations, maintenance, or any other department. The position is dynamic and requires a mix of laboratory and analytical skills. Candidate must maintain a high degree of independence, responsibility and accountability in planning and reporting laboratory experiments. Candidate must be able to communicate clearly and effectively with all relevant stakeholders in the Process Support and laboratory experiment to maximize productivity. This is a safety sensitive position. Job Description: Responsibilities for this position may include but are not limited to: Analytical laboratory operations services are but not limited to: Sampling of Natural gas, condensate, water, ethylene glycol, TEG, Lube oil and process fluids. Sampling and analysis of various samples that required by projects in gas plant operations like turbo expander, compression etc. Monitoring integrity of sample during sampling of process and non-process fluids done by operations personnel Assist in Calibration and maintenance of analytical equipment (like ‚Äì GC, ICP, IC, KF coulometer, Potentiometer, etc.) Perform Natural gas analysis: dew point test, gas composition, heating value & specific gravity (SG) as per ASTM methods Perform Natural gas condensate analysis as per ASTM methods: Simulated distillation, API gravity, SG, BS&W Perform pH, Conductivity, turbidity, alkalinity, Hardness, TDS, TSS, Chloride, TPH, anions, cations, Dissolve oxygen, BOD, COD, and other parameters of water as per ASTM, EPA, APHA or domestic methods. Perform test for Glycol (MEG & TEG)

Proven track record of achieving sales targets and managing key accounts. Technical knowledge of battery technologies, applications, and industry standards. Strong network and existing contacts within the battery supply chain is a bonus. Skills Requirement: Excellent communication, negotiation, and presentation skills in English. Proficiency in CRM software and MS Office. Willingness to travel domestically and internationally as required. Responsibilities & Context Job Overview: The Sales Executive will be responsible for developing and expanding customer base within the battery market. The ideal candidate will have a strong technical understanding of battery products and market trends, combined with a demonstrated ability to build relationships, negotiate contracts, and achieve sales targets. Collaborate with cross-functional teams (R&D, engineering, marketing) to ensure customer satisfaction and product alignment. Provide regular sales forecasts, market feedback, and competitor analysis to management. job_description: Fashion Designer - Modern Classic Knitwear & Casualwear : Izyan & Co Jobs ENG ‡¶¨‡¶æ‡¶Ç‡¶≤‡¶æ Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Izyan & Co Fashion Designer - Modern Classic Knitwear & Casualwear Application Deadline : 28 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Company Information Summary Vacancy: 1 Age: 20 to 30 years Location: Dhaka Salary: Tk. 25000 - 35000 (Monthly) Published: 02 Feb 2026 To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age 20 to 30 years Responsibilities & Context Collection & Concept Develop seasonal collections/capsules focused on modern classic casualwear: sweatshirts, hoodies, knit tops, T-shirts, joggers and casual trousers. Create moodboards and concept boards inspired by classic, elegant, structured fashion (not loud or flashy styles). Research colors, fabrics and trims suitable for timeless, premium-feel products (neutral tones, rich basics, subtle contrast). Design Development Design garments (front/back/side views) with clear detailing: panels, seams, ribs, cuffs, necklines, hems, pockets and logo/branding placements. Develop branding applications (minimal logos, badges, labels, neck prints, hangtags) that fit a modern classic brand identity. Prepare complete tech packs for each style (measurements, construction details, fabric & trim specs, colorways, size range). Sampling & Production Support Work with pattern masters, sample section and merchandisers to turn designs into accurate samples. Review proto and size-set samples, check fit and proportions, and give clear corrections to achieve a clean, structured look. Support fabric and accessory selection (GSM, knit type, ribs, zippers, cords, buttons) to match the desired quality and feel. Quality & Brand Consistency Maintain consistency in silhouette, fit, color palette and logo/branding use across the full collection. Ensure all designs reflect a refined, modern classic look ‚Äì no over-designed or overly trendy pieces. Work with the marketing/content team on outfit ideas, styling for photoshoots and how products should appear on ecommerce platforms. Coordination & Documentation Present design concepts and new collections to founders/management for approval. Maintain an organized archive of all designs, tech packs, fabric swatches and sample records. Coordinate closely with production and merchandising teams to meet collection timelines and launch plans. Quality Control / Quality Assurance Manager - Footwear : Allure Leathers Limited Jobs ENG ‡¶¨‡¶æ‡¶Ç‡¶≤‡¶æ Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Allure Leathers Limited Quality Control / Quality Assurance Manager - Footwear Application Deadline : 28 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: 1 Location: Dhaka (Ashulia), Gazipur Salary: Negotiable Published: 02 Feb 2026 Applicants are encouraged to submit Video CV. To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements 7+ years of QC/QA experience in a footwear manufacturing environment In-depth knowledge of leather properties, upper-making processes, and finishing quality standards Additional Requirements: Strong leadership and troubleshooting ability Familiar with inline QC tools, AQL standards, and rejection analysis methods Hands-on experience with documentation, reporting, and process audits Responsibilities & Context Allure Leathers manufactures premium leather & synthetic footwear for the local retail and wholesale market. Develop and monitor KPIs and productivity benchmarks aligned with buyer and management expectations. Train, mentor, and evaluate IE team members and production supervisors on IE tools and best practices. Ensure compliance with buyer productivity requirements, cost targets, and operational standards. Senior System Engineer/ System Engineer- (Pre- Sales) Application Deadline : 28 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: 1 Age: 27 to 40 years Location: Dhaka (PanthaPath) Salary: Negotiable Published: 05 Feb 2026 Applicants are encouraged to submit Video CV. To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age 27 to 40 years Technical Skills: Virtualization: VMware vSphere/ESXi, Hyper-V, Nutanix AHV Servers & Storage: Dell, HPE, Lenovo, SAN/NAS technologies Backup & DR: Veeam, Commvault, or equivalent solutions Operating Systems: Windows Server, Linux Cloud & Hybrid Infrastructure (preferred): Azure, AWS, Private Cloud Monitoring, automation, and scripting knowledge is an added advantage Responsibilities & Context Pre-Sales & Solution Design: Understand customer business needs, technical queries, and infrastructure requirements through meetings, workshops, and site visits. Design end-to-end Data Center and Virtualization solutions based on customer requirements, best practices, and industry standards. Prepare solution architecture, technical proposals, BOM (Bill of Materials), compliance matrices, and technical presentations. Deliver technical presentations, demos, and solution walkthroughs to customers, including enterprise and mid-market clients. Support the sales team during bid management, RFQ/RFP/RFI responses, and technical clarifications. Proof of Concept (PoC) & Validation: Execute Proof of Concepts (PoC) for new technologies and proposed solutions to validate feasibility, performance, and compatibility. Key Responsibilities: Prepare financial statements and other financial reports like accounting ledger, trial balance, receipt and payments statement, balance sheet, income statement, and related accounting statements & reports through Tally and ERP Software. Prepare, examine, and analyze bills/invoices, vouchers, accounts receivables, accounts payable, accounting records, financial statements, inventory management and other financial reports to assess accuracy, completeness, and conformance to reporting and procedural standards, Perform entries to proper accounts. Check & verify all transactions before entry into the ledger, check money receipt. bill, voucher, daily expenses, etc. Coordinate and monitor day-to-day accounting and financing work. Managing Banking Activities & Reconcile Bank Ledger with Ledger of Accounts Dept. Maintain Payable & Receivable Balance for monthly reconciliation. Receive the money collected from the sales representatives and field officers, deposit it into company‚Äôs authorized bank account. Prepare daily cash report or remittance slip and weekly remittance statements, sign and send to the associated department at the head office. Prepare a proper money receipt against each collected money, send it to the invoice section and provide its copy to the sales representative and/or field officer. Supervise and prepare the up-to-date list of arrears and send it to the associated person or department. Record properly the advance money paid to the sales representatives in the petty cash book and update the account daily by preparing and reconciling the list against the advance money. Check and verify the bills received from the sales representatives, adjust the petty cash accordingly and send them to head office at the end of each month. Maintain cash book data entry and cash journal records. Maintain petty cash records. Supervise and document petty cash expenses daily. Maintain liaison between the head office and depot office. Perform other related duties as required and assigned by the management. Prepare and process monthly payroll Calculate salaries, overtime, bonuses, incentives, deductions, and arrears Ensure timely salary disbursement through bank or cash systems. Proficiency in MS Excel and accounting software. Strong negotiation and communication skills. Willingness to travel within the city/assigned areas for bill collection. High level of integrity and time-management skills. Responsibilities & Context Billing & Invoicing: Prepare, verify, and issue customer invoices based on approved contracts, service delivery reports, and SLAs. Ensure invoices are accurate, complete, and compliant with company policy and VAT/tax regulations. Maintain proper documentation of billing approvals and supporting documents. Accounts Receivable Management: Maintain and update customer ledger and aging reports on a regular basis. Monitor outstanding receivables and follow up to ensure timely payment collection. Identify overdue accounts and escalate critical issues to management. Customer Visit & Collection: Visit customers physically for bill submission, follow-up, and payment collection within the approved credit period. Coordinate with customer accounts/finance teams to resolve billing disputes or discrepancies. Collect cheques, payment advices, or confirmation of bank transfers as applicable. job_description: Frontend Engineer (React.js) with Backend Integration Experience : Corporate Care IT Jobs ENG ‡¶¨‡¶æ‡¶Ç‡¶≤‡¶æ Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Corporate Care IT Frontend Engineer (React.js) with Backend Integration Experience Application Deadline : 28 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Company Information Summary Vacancy: -- Age: 25 to 35 years Location: Dhaka Salary: Negotiable Published: 29 Jan 2026 To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age 25 to 35 years What We Expect: At this level, candidates are expected to:¬∑ Work independently with minimal hand-holding¬∑ Understand data privacy, auditability, and system reliability¬∑ Write production-grade, review-ready code¬∑ Debug and resolve issues in live, regulated environments¬∑ Communicate clearly with international stakeholders¬∑ Take ownership of delivery quality, timelines, and risk Domain Context: Engineers will work on systems involving: AI-assisted underwriting and risk scoring Integration with third-party APIs and data providers Secure handling of PII and sensitive customer data Who This Role Is Ideal For: Professionals who: Care about correctness, explainability, and reliability Understand that AI systems require engineering discipline, not just models Want to grow in AI-driven insurance and enterprise systems Responsibilities & Context Corporate Care IT is a growing IT-enabled services and technology solutions company delivering production-grade web, software, and AI solutions to international clients, primarily in the US insurance and financial services sector. Our work involves AI-powered insurance platforms spanning underwriting, claims processing, risk assessment, document intelligence, and customer-facing automation. We operate in data-sensitive, compliance-aware, and high-reliability environments and are looking for engineers who can take ownership and deliver with confidence. As we are hiring engineers for specialized roles across different coding domains, please read the details carefully below: Core Responsibilities: Develop responsive, accessible, and SEO-friendly web interfaces using HTML5 and CSS3 (Flexbox, Grid, Tailwind CSS) Build reusable React.js components and manage state using hooks and modern architecture Implement Next.js features including routing, SSR, and performance optimization Develop complex, form-heavy workflows with proper validation and error handling Ensure cross-browser compatibility and responsive design across devices Write clean, maintainable code and manage dependencies using npm/yarn Collaborate using Git/GitHub and debug production issues efficiently Apply strong JavaScript (ES6+) fundamentals including async/await and promises Security & Code Reliability: Experience handling secure user inputs and validations Awareness of frontend security concerns (XSS, CSRF basics) Ability

Responsibilities & Context Sterling Styles Limited is a 100% Export-oriented woven top-bottom garments manufacturing company, located at Ashulia. The company is seeking to appoint a talent aspirant to the Assistant Manager/Manager role in the VAT & Tax section of Accounts & Finance. The candidate has to lead the tax and VAT function by ensuring 100% compliance with Bangladesh's fiscal laws, optimizing tax liabilities through strategic planning, and representing the company before NBR authorities. PLEASE DO NOT APPLY if you do not have VAT & TAX Experience in the RMG Industry. Oversee the maintenance of all VAT registers, including Mushak 6.1, 6.2, 6.3, 6.6, 6.8, and 9.1 (VAT Return). Prepare and monitor Advance Tax (Section 154) payments and manage Tax Provisioning schedules monthly. Oversee the preparation and filing of Monthly/Annual Withholding Tax Returns and the Annual Corporate Tax Return. Prepare detailed Landed Cost Sheets by calculating Customs Duty (CD), Regulatory Duty (RD), Supplementary Duty (SD), and Advance Tax (AT) for imported raw materials. Coordinate with the Commercial team to ensure that VAT and Duty exemptions are correctly reflected in the books. Act as the primary point of contact for External Auditors and NBR Officials during annual Tax/VAT audits, hearing & appeal matters, investigations, and show-cause notices. Monitor changes in Finance Acts, SROs (Statutory Regulatory Orders), and General Orders to advise management on potential impacts. AB Bank PLC, formerly known as Arab Bangladesh Bank, is the country`s first private sector commercial bank established in 1981. With more than four decades of experience in banking excellence, innovation, and financial inclusion, the Bank invites potential and capable individuals to join its team as Management Trainee Officers (MTO) and grow in a dynamic and professional environment. WHY CHOOSE AB BANK? At AB Bank, we are more than a financial institution. We represent a legacy built on professionalism, progress and trust. Our operations span a comprehensive range of banking services including: Corporate and Structured Finance Retail and SME Banking Islamic Banking Treasury and Foreign Exchange Services Digital Banking Solutions Over the past 43 years, AB Bank has consistently evolved to meet the changing needs of customers through technology and customer-focused solutions. Today, the Bank operates 104 full-service branches supported by a growing network of sub-branches, agent banking outlets, and more than 250 ATMs across the country. To diversify its business portfolio, AB Bank operates several subsidiaries including AB Investment Limited (ABIL), AB Securities Limited (ABSL), Cashlink Bangladesh Limited (CBL) and AB International Finance Limited (ABIFL), Hong Kong. The Bank also maintains an overseas branch in Mumbai, India and a representative office in Yangon, Myanmar reflecting its international footprint. YOUR CAREER STARTS HERE During the 24-month traineeship period, Management Trainee Officers will receive structured on-the-job, in-house and external training programs to develop their professional competence, leadership capability and practical exposure. The on-the-job training program includes rotational assignments in General Banking, Credit Management and Foreign Exchange Operations to develop core banking expertise. CSSD Technician: 2‚Äì3+ years hands-on CSSD experience. Experience in autoclave and sterilizer operation preferred. Responsibilities & Context Instrument Reprocessing Receive used instruments and devices from OT, wards, ICU, and other units. Perform proper sorting and segregation of instruments. Carry out manual and mechanical cleaning procedures. Operate ultrasonic cleaners and washer‚Äìdisinfectors where available. Inspect instruments for cleanliness, function, and damage. Sterilization Process Prepare, assemble, and pack instrument sets and trays. Operate sterilization equipment (autoclave, ETO, plasma, dry heat as applicable). Select correct sterilization cycle based on item type. Monitor sterilization parameters (time, temperature, pressure). Use and document chemical and biological indicators. Storage & Distribution Label sterile packs with date, batch, and expiry. Maintain sterile storage conditions as per protocol. Issue sterile supplies based on requisition. Maintain FIFO (First In First Out) system. Documentation & Quality Control Maintain sterilization logs and registers. Record load details and test results. Report sterilization failures or equipment malfunction immediately. Support audit and infection control checks. Infection Control & Safety Follow infection prevention and control (IPC) guidelines. Use PPE properly during all decontamination and sterilization work. Follow biomedical waste segregation rules. Ensure clean and dirty zone separation. Equipment Care Clean and maintain CSSD machines and work areas. Perform routine checks of autoclaves and sealing machines. Coordinate with maintenance for breakdowns. This role requires a high degree of integrity, numerical accuracy and an understanding of NGO-specific financial regulations. Key Responsibilities Financial Documentation: Maintain and manage books of accounts (Cash Book, General Ledger) in strict compliance with Income Tax, VAT regulations and NGO Affairs Bureau guidelines. Transaction Management: Process, verify and input daily financial data into the accounting system with 100% accuracy. Banking & Payroll: Execute all banking transactions and assist in the preparation of monthly salary sheets and timely disbursement of staff benefits. Compliance & Reconciliation: Perform regular bank reconciliations and ensure all expenditures are backed by proper approvals and supporting vouchers. Audit Readiness: Support internal and external audit processes by organizing financial documents and addressing auditor queries promptly. Budgeting Assistance: Assist in the preparation of project-wise budgets and financial reports for donors and the NGO Affairs Bureau. Asset, Inventory & Stock Control: Monitor stock management processes and maintain updated registers for fixed assets and consumables. Reporting: Generate monthly financial statements and variance reports for management review to ensure goal alignment. Responsibilities & Context Job Summary: We are seeking a skilled and dedicated Scientific Officer ‚Äì Bull Station to oversee animal health management, semen production, laboratory quality control, and overall farm biosecurity operations. The position requires strong veterinary expertise, hands-on technical experience in AI laboratory functions, and effective coordination with farm and laboratory teams to ensure optimal productivity and compliance with regulatory standards. Key Responsibilities: Monitor daily animal health conditions and implement vaccination and deworming programs as per guidelines. Perform minor and major surgical procedures and follow approved treatment protocols under supervision. Oversee overall management of bulls, milking cows, calves, and heifers, including feeding, hygiene, heat detection, and health monitoring. Monitor reproductive performance and herd productivity. Supervise bull shed supervisors and farm labor activities. Conduct bull semen collection and ensure quality standards. Analyze individual semen production and evaluate the lifetime productivity of bulls. Manage semen processing, preservation, quality assurance, and distribution to designated locations. Certify semen quality at laboratory and field levels. Prepare, maintain, and analyze QC reports of all incoming AI laboratory materials and submit to the higher authority. Maintain AI laboratory registers, including bull register, semen collection and evaluation register, product check register, temperature and humidity register, and health observation register. Ensure proper documentation and compliance with regulatory requirements. Supervise farm biosecurity control measures. Conduct zoonotic disease screening and testing, including brucellosis, TB, Campylobacter spp., and trichomoniasis. Assist in the preparation of the Bull Profile and submission to DLS for approval. This is not a support function. The role carries direct accountability for production output, cost control, operational efficiency, enforcement of IE discipline, and buyer-facing compliance requirements. Reporting directly to the Plant Head / Managing Director, the position operates as a core member of the factory leadership team, with a decisive influence on cost structure, delivery reliability, production performance, and buyer confidence Key Responsibilities 1. Industrial Engineering Leadership & Ownership Own and lead all Industrial Engineering functions across Cutting, Sewing, and Finishing. Govern method study and workplace engineering to ensure disciplined, standardized operations. 3. SMV, Capacity & Line Control Establish and control SMV setting, capacity planning, and line balancing as factory standards. Ensure alignment between IE planning and production execution. 4. Productivity Improvement & Bottleneck Resolution Identify and resolve productivity losses, workflow constraints, and inefficiencies at plant level. The role: Oxfam in Bangladesh is looking for a Head of the Project Management Unit (PMU) to provide strategic leadership for the overall national portfolio of restricted grants, ensuring high-quality project management, donor compliance, risk mitigation, and effective partnership delivery. job_description: Senior Officer / Assistant Manager ‚Äì Supply Chain Finance : Akij Resources Jobs ENG ‡¶¨‡¶æ‡¶Ç‡¶≤‡¶æ Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Akij Resources Senior Officer / Assistant Manager ‚Äì Supply Chain Finance Application Deadline : 28 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: -- Location: Dhaka Salary: Negotiable Published: 18 Feb 2026 To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Partly-qualified CA (CC) candidates will be given preference. Strong knowledge of cost accounting, standard costing, and variance analysis. Strong proficiency in Microsoft Excel; working knowledge of ERP systems (such as SAP, Oracle, or similar) and BI tools will be an added advantage. Responsibilities & Context Partner closely with Procurement, Production, Warehousing, and Logistics teams to improve cost efficiency, productivity, and operational performance. Maintain product and process costing systems and perform detailed analysis of material, conversion, energy, and logistics cost variances. Monitor and optimize material yield, scrap and wastage levels, utility consumption, and logistics cost per ton. Track inventory levels, Days of Inventory (DOI), slow-moving and obsolete stock, and support working capital optimization initiatives. Analyze freight, handling, and distribution costs by route, plant, and customer segment to support logistics network optimization. Prepare and present monthly Supply Chain Finance MIS, including dashboards on cost per ton, yield, capacity utilization, and efficiency ratios. Ensure strong internal controls over procurement, inventory management, and logistics operations, and support internal and external audit processes. Identify opportunities for process improvement, digitization, and basic automation in supply chain finance reporting and workflows. Provide management with ad-hoc operational and financial analysis to support strategic and tactical decision-making. Skills & Expertise ERP Software ERP/SAP Software Microsoft Power BI MS Excel Oracle Tally Software Compensation & Other Benefits T/A,Provident fund,Medical allowance,Mobile bill,Gratuity,Insurance Festival Bonus: 2 Earned Leave Facility Salary Review after Probation Period Workplace Work at office Employment Status Full Time Job Location Dhaka Job Highlights Akij Resource is seeking a proactive finance professional to support costing, inventory control, logistics cost analysis, MIS reporting, and internal control across the supply chain. Georeference and adjust mouza maps using AutoCAD and GIS software. Digitize affected plots, structures, and other assets for Land Acquisition Plan (LAP) preparation. Identify full and partial plot acquisition; distinguish private, government, and khas land. Develop and maintain a geo-referenced GIS database of all impacted plots and structures. Prepare Plot Schedule (Daag-Shuchi), Cha-Form, and other statutory land acquisition documents for submission. Produce alignment strip maps, impact maps, cross-section and long-section (plan/profile) drawings from topographic survey data. Draft cartographic drawings and mapping annexures for inclusion in LAP. Support field verification and Joint Verification (JV) exercises with DC office and project teams. Supervise and assist field teams during surveys and verification activities. Reconcile discrepancies between field survey data, cadastral maps, and engineering designs. Perform data collection, processing, and spatial analysis using AutoCAD, Civil 3D, ArcGIS/QGIS, and other relevant software. Update maps and calculations in response to alignment or design revisions. Ensure quality control and accuracy of all spatial data, maps, and land calculations. Maintain organized digital archives of all survey outputs, maps, and GIS databases. Liaise and coordinate with clients, government officials, and stakeholders as required. Provide technical clarification and support during objection hearings and DC office reviews. Experience At least 4 years The applicants should have experience in the following business area(s): NGO, Development Agency Additional Requirements Additional Job Requirements: In depth knowledge on common livestock diseases (e.g., PPR, FMD, mastitis), vaccination schedules, deworming protocols, biosecurity, and emergency first aid for cattle, goats, poultry, etc. Familiarity with feed formulation basics, mineral supplementation, breeding cycles, AI (artificial insemination) basics, and neonatal care. In depth knowledge correct usage, dosage, and precautions for vaccines, antibiotics, anthelmintics, and supplements; awareness of withdrawal periods. Knowledge on standard operating procedures for call handling, escalation pathways, documentation standards, and data privacy norms. Knowledge on government and local regulations on animal health and welfare, BRAC/partner programme linkages (MF, AI, UPG, IDP, CCP), and donor/reporting expectations. Handle inbound/outbound calls, email, and chat with clarity, empathy, and cultural sensitivity in Bangla/English (and local dialects where possible). Elicit accurate case histories over phone/messages; identify urgency; recommend basic first-line care and when to refer to a veterinarian. Conduct structured field visits, collect accurate geo-tagged data, maintain records, and prepare concise summaries for analysis. Collaborate with field agents, vets, product teams, insurers, and external partners; align actions and close the loop on farmer issues. Stay abreast of new protocols/products and translate technical concepts into simple, actionable guidance for farmers. Listens attentively, responds respectfully, and maintains a farmer-first mindset‚Äîespecially during distress (e.g., disease outbreaks). Applies structured thinking to incomplete information, prioritizes cases effectively, and makes safe, practical recommendations. Maintains accurate, timely records of interactions, follow-ups, complaints, and resolutions; ensures data integrity. Works smoothly across BRAC internal programmes and external stakeholders; builds trust and nudges action without authority. Manages high call volumes, shifting field realities, and seasonal surges; maintains quality under pressure. Experience Requirements: Minimum 4 years

Responsibilities & Context BRAC is an international development organization founded in Bangladesh that partners with over 100 million people living with inequality and poverty globally to create sustainable opportunities to realize potential. BRAC Microfinance provides people who cannot access traditional financial banking services with access to a suite of financial products including loans, savings, and microinsurance. Through this initiative, BRAC supports families to invest in income-generating activities, build assets, and reduce vulnerability to health and natural shocks. Working at BRAC is not like any other job. It is a platform where you can bring about real change for people who need it most. Join us to build a more financially inclusive society, where data and innovation drive impact. Responsibilities & Context Overview: A global container shipping leader is seeking an experienced professional to head its Export Customer Service & Documentation department in Bangladesh. Utilize hands-on experience in EDI platforms, SAP, and enterprise logistics software to manage workflows and resolve operational issues. Monitor KPIs related to space utilization, documentation accuracy, and service performance. Coordinate with internal departments and external stakeholders to ensure seamless export execution. Represent the department in audits, compliance reviews, and regulatory inspections. Drive digital transformation and automation initiatives to streamline export processes. Lead and develop a diverse team of 20+ professionals, fostering a culture of accountability and collaboration. Application Deadline : 28 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: -- Age: 26 to 40 years Location: Dhaka Salary: Negotiable Experience: At least 2 years Published: 20 Feb 2026 Application Insights View Requirements Education Bachelor of Science (BSc) in Civil Engineering Diploma in Civil Experience At least 2 years The applicants should have experience in the following business area(s): Cement, Real Estate Additional Requirements Age 26 to 40 years Preference will be given to candidates who bring solid experience in Ready Mix Concrete production, and such applicants are highly encouraged to apply. Responsibilities & Context If you're looking for a role where you can continue to make an impression, take the next step at Bashundhara Ready Mix & Construction Industries Limited where your contributions will always be valued. We are currently seeking an ambitious individual to join this team in the role of Executive/ Sr. Executive (Production) for Bashundhara Ready Mix & Construction Industries Ltd. Job Responsibilities: Plan, schedule, and coordinate daily concrete production operations to ensure timely deliveries in full compliance with customer specifications and quality standards. Continuously monitor plant performance and proactively optimize production levels in line with demand forecasts and operational priorities. Oversee raw material inventory‚Äîincluding cement, aggregates, admixtures, and related inputs‚Äîand coordinate timely replenishment to ensure uninterrupted production. Collaborates with quality control, maintenance, logistics, and sales teams to streamline workflows, troubleshoot issues, and achieve production targets. Maintain accurate and up-to-date production records, inventory logs, and operational reports to support planning, traceability, and management review. Promptly identify, report, and coordinate the resolution of equipment or process-related issues to minimize downtime and maintain optimal plant efficiency. Plan and allocate manpower across multiple plants to meet daily operational requirements while ensuring productivity and compliance. Carry out any additional duties or responsibilities as assigned by management in support of overall operational objectives. Officer, Quality Assurance : Healthcare Chemicals Limited Jobs ENG ‡¶¨‡¶æ‡¶Ç‡¶≤‡¶æ Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Healthcare Chemicals Limited Officer, Quality Assurance Application Deadline : 28 Feb 2026 Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Company Information Summary Vacancy: -- Location: Munshiganj (Gazaria) Published: 20 Feb 2026 Application Insights View Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Experience requirements: 1-2 years of relevant experience is preferred. Fresh candidates are also encouraged to apply. Skills & Competencies Willingness to learn and follow instructions. Good documentation and communication skills. Teamwork and discipline. Ability to work under stress. Responsibilities & Context Healthcare Chemicals Limited (HCL), a sister concern of Healthcare Pharmaceuticals Limited, located in API Park, besides Dhaka-Chittagong Highway in Gazaria upazila of Munshiganj, envisions manufacturing world class pharmaceutical raw materials for the local and foreign markets. HCL would like to reduce dependency on foreign sourcing of raw materials for the pharmaceuticals industry and save valuable foreign currency of the country. HCL will manufacture Active Pharmaceutical Ingredients (APIs) and related key chemicals required for the pharmaceuticals industry. We are looking for dynamic, self-motivated individuals for the following position in HCL. Job Description/responsibility: Ensure compliance with cGMP, SOPs, and regulatory requirements in manufacturing and packaging areas. Perform line clearance, IPQC, BMR and logbook checking, and handling of retention sample. Prepare and control SOPs and ensure QMS-related documentation is maintained. Compile batch documents and perform batch release activities. Conduct sampling of intermediate and finished products, including cleaning and process validation samples. Conduct investigations for deviations, incidents, non-conformances, market complaints, and OOS/OOT results. Prepare the Annual Product Quality Review (APQR). Handle the Market Compliant, Deviation, Incident, CAPA, NCR & rejections. Coordinate change control activities and follow up on associated actions. Follow up on CAPA and evaluate its effectiveness. Coordinate and conduct training activities. Strong verbal and written communication skills are required. Preference will be given to the candidates with experience in using ERP software. Responsibilities & Context Oversee all managerial activities related to the assigned depot, ensuring smooth and efficient operations. Liaise regularly with the factory to coordinate and ensure timely dispatch and availability of products at the depot. Supervise depot-level production processes (where applicable), monitor sales performance, and prepare accurate reports for senior management. Maintain optimal inventory levels by tracking stock movements, monitoring sales trends, and ensuring timely replenishment. Plan and manage delivery schedules and vehicle routing for secure and on-time transportation of goods to customers. Develop and implement effective sales and marketing strategies to expand the customer base and product reach. Maintain proper documentation and compliance with all VAT & Tax requirements, including timely preparation and submission of returns. Ensure all depot transactions are accurately recorded using Dream App ERP and Tally software. Build and maintain effective relationships with customers, resolve issues promptly, and ensure a high level of customer satisfaction. Coordinate with external stakeholders, including banks, DCT, VAT-Tax offices, Customs, DIEF, and others as required. Manage depot HR & administrative functions, including attendance, leave, discipline, and performance tracking. Ensure compliance with all health, safety, and environmental regulations at the depot. Oversee maintenance of depot infrastructure, security, utilities, and cleanliness. Support internal and external audits by providing necessary documentation and explanations. Identify process improvements and cost-saving opportunities in depot operations. Perform any other duties assigned by the supervisor or company management. Responsibilities & Context Invoice Preparation: Accurately preparing invoices based on purchase orders (POs) and services rendered, ensuring all details like pricing, taxes, and discounts are correct. Matching Process: Verifying invoice details against purchase orders and receiving reports (a three-way match process) to ensure accuracy before approval. Customer Sign-off: Ensuring that the customer signs off on invoices and delivery notes to prevent future disputes. System Entry: Accurately entering all billing information into the financial management system or ERP software. Timely & Accurate Billing: Ensure that invoices are generated promptly and accurately, detailing pricing, taxes, and payment due dates, to prevent payment disputes. Credit Monitoring: Conduct initial credit checks on new clients and monitor the credit limits and outstanding balances of existing accounts in collaboration with the finance department. Systematic Collection: Implement a clear collection process for overdue payments, starting with gentle reminders and escalating to formal communication if necessary, while maintaining professionalism. Documentation: Maintain thorough records of all financial interactions, payment agreements, and collection activities to track progress and provide evidence if legal action is ever required. Application Insights View Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age 35 to 40 years Only Female Strong leadership ability and effective team management skills. Ability to make prompt decisions under pressure. Excellent communication skills with doctors, patients, attendants, and staff members. Strong observation and problem-solving skills. Proficiency in computer applications (MS Word, MS Excel) and report preparation. Willingness to work in shifts, including night shifts when required. Commitment to maintaining hospital discipline and adhering strictly to professional policies and procedures. Must be honest, responsible, and possess high ethical standards. Knowledge of medico-legal matters and incident reporting procedures. Practical experience in infection control and patient safety will be considered an advantage Responsibilities & Context Preparing the nursing duty roster for all shifts and ensuring adequate manpower in each shift. Regularly supervising whether nursing care is being provided to patients according to established standards. Monitoring the proper implementation of medical instructions provided by duty doctors or consultants. Making quick, effective decisions during emergencies and coordinating with all relevant departments. Providing regular training, guidelines, and counseling to all nurses and Patient Care Assistants (PCA). Conducting regular physical inspections of nursing activities in Wards, Cabins, Emergency, NICU, OT and POU. Hospital linen and other nursing assets must be properly maintained, used responsibly, and any loss promptly reported. Receiving complaints from patients or their relatives and taking immediate steps for resolution. Reporting any breach of discipline or negligence of duty to the higher authority immediately. Ensuring the proper implementation of hospital policies and Standard Operating Procedures (SOP) in every department. Preparing and submitting daily, weekly, and monthly work reports to the management. Ensuring that the handover process for each shift is completed accurately and smoothly. Regularly auditing nursing documentation, such as vital charts, medication charts, and input-output charts. Monitoring nursing staff attendance, late arrivals, or unauthorized absence from duty and reporting to HR.
